name: react-emotive
description: Wrapper for 'Emotive' library to use in React projects
author: Zanomate

scripts.clean: shx rm -rf dist/ && shx mkdir dist
scripts.build: npm run build:es6 && npm run build:esm && npm run build:cjs && npm run build:umd
scripts.build:es6: tsc --moduleResolution node --module es2015 --target es2015 --outDir dist react-emotive.ts && shx mv dist/react-emotive.js dist/react-emotive.es6.js
scripts.build:esm: tsc --moduleResolution node --module es2015 --target es5 --outDir dist react-emotive.ts && shx mv dist/react-emotive.js dist/react-emotive.esm.js
scripts.build:cjs: tsc --module commonjs --target es5 --outDir dist --declaration --declarationDir dist react-emotive.ts && shx mv dist/react-emotive.js dist/react-emotive.cjs.js
scripts.cp: shx cp build/package.json dist/package.json && shx cp README.md dist/README.md
scripts.all: npm run clean && npm run gen && npm run build && npm run cp
